name: Long live the King! (itch)
description:
(Inspired by the King Arthur movie, GOT, Adventure Time and others)

You are the King of the Farland Kingdom, as a king, you are always concerned about your gold... people***.

Your kingdom is not doing so well, you have some power issues, something to do with people management.
In an act of despair, you signed a pact with the demon living under your castle, an agreement for exchanging life for power.

Of course, you are not stupid, are you?
For a reason you are (still) the king, you noticed that nowhere in the contract says that it was your own life.

As a king responsible for hundreds of people, you have to "collaborate" with your subjects to guide them to the demon, or to the armory.

Gain power, defend your kingdom!

______________________________________

The idea of the game is to survive until the 6th wave, managing your power and army, using it to defeat the mercenaries. 

Then the game will keep going, but you can name yourself victorious in that moment.

You have to command your people to follow you, to the demon to gain power, or to the armory, to use your power to turn them into warriors despite of what they want.

Oh, and there are some delicious mushrooms, if you are into that!

The number in the left is your power, you gain power giving people to the demon, and spend it turning people to soldiers.
The number in the right is your life, if you run out of life everything would be in vain.

Controls:

WASD - Movement
Shift - Sprint
Left Click (keep pressed)- Command people to follow you

If the game runs slowly, give it some time, it will get better in a moment.
